title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: positron.tutorials collection tutorials working Positron. Covers scripts, Quarto documents, git, Github, Quarto websites. Makes extensive use tools tutorial.helpers package.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: install package CRAN: can install development version GitHub :

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: seven tutorials package. parentheses title tutorial, show code running tutorial. Example: Positron Code (“01-code”). Introduce students Positron writing R code simple scripts. Positron Quarto (“02-quarto”). Demonstrate tricks working R code using Positron, also explain Quarto documents. Terminal (“03-terminal”). Teach command line. Positron GitHub Introduction (“04-github-1”). Explain basics Git GitHub, mostly context Positron. Positron GitHub Advanced (“05-github-2”). Provide practice working Git/GitHub, including details use GitHub Pages. Quarto Websites Introduction (“06-websites-1”). Demonstrate basics website construction using Quarto projects. Quarto Websites Advanced (“07-websites-2”). Practice Quarto websites, focus splitting data analysis tasks separate files.

title: positron.tutorials (development version)
text: Clean functions tests. Clean DESCRIPTION. Update R 4.5.0.

title: positron.tutorials 0.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2025-03-24 Added single quotes software program names TITLE DESCRIPTION, following CRAN guidelines. Added process_submissions() function.

title: positron.tutorials 0.1.0
text: Use GitHub Pages publishing. Redo PNG files. Transition tutorials covering Positron instead RStudio.
